title: Control the Elder Brain
content:
For the first time your thoughts are your own but the Elder Brain drops from the sky. All the mind flayers are defeated. You and your companions have a conversation on the docks, Orpheus talks about wanting to liberate his people but he has done it wrong. He asks you to end him, and asks Lae'zel to carry his hope, You will have the following dialogue options.

You should do this, Lae'zel. Your people need you. [PERSUASION] You have found new purpose here, Lae'zel. Stay in Faerun, craft a new fa
